Class ExamPanel

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.student.ExamPanel
public class ExamPanel extends Object
Panel for displaying and taking an exam in the main content area Provides interface for viewing exam questions, selecting answers, and submitting completed exams

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ExamPanel(ExamsTab parentTab, Exam exam, ExamService examService, int studentId)
    Creates a new ExamPanel with the necessary data for taking an exam

  • Constructor Details

    • ExamPanel

      public ExamPanel(ExamsTab parentTab, Exam exam, ExamService examService, int studentId)
      Creates a new ExamPanel with the necessary data for taking an exam
      Parameters:
      parentTab - the parent ExamsTab that created this panel
      exam - the exam to be taken
      examService - service for exam-related operations
      studentId - the ID of the student taking the exam

  • Method Details

    • createContent

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createContent()
      Creates and returns the exam content UI Sets up the UI with exam information, questions, and submit button
      Returns:
      the VBox containing the exam panel
